promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi cute legendary lizard water-type wearing a cyan glittering mask. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or water. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Glitzillo, a chibi cute legendary lizard water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: crabhammer. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word lizard or water or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, lizard-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, aurora background
generatedDescription: Glitzillo spends its days playing in river beds, weaving sparkling bubbles and dodging crabclaws.
